content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This module provides helpful new hire information.  Access is provided prior to your start date for your convenience, but review is voluntary, and all content will remain available after you begin your employment. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We would really like to make the process of your onboarding friendly, comfortable and enjoyable!\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rShortly before start date you will receive a ‘Welcome’ mail with the main information about your first day at EPAM (onboarding schedule and list of documents you need to bring with you).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This mail helps in making the onboarding easier for you.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
